idea:

name: DC IKIGAI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Newly Developed Spectra360 series Air and Surface Disinfectant systems using (UVGI) High Output UV-C Lamps. Spectra360 series UV light sterilizers can kill 99.9% of Bacteria, Fungi, (ssRNA/ssDNA/dsRNA/dsDNA) including (SARS CoV-2/COVID19) within several minutes.


Unlike chemical approaches to disinfection, UV light provides rapid, effective inactivation of microorganisms through a physical process. High irradiance, 360 degree coverage and shadow less system ensures every nook and corner of area to be thoroughly cleaned.


System also includes safety sensors which eliminates chances of causing harm to humans if mistakenly comes in view of the system when the cleaning cycle is deployed.


Remote operation (Android App controlled) of the device further enhances the safe operation. It can be programmed or scheduled as per requirement. It is IoT enabled (WIfi/BLE) allowing it to be controlled via the Internet.


Built in Intelligence in the machine predicts time for maintenance and service required and also indicates when UV lamps should be replaced for continual effective cleaning.
name: Neutral Atom
